TABLE_VALUE: select ID_SERVICE ID_VALUE, NAME_SERVICE NAME_VALUE from EPS_SERVICE
select P.ID_PROVIDER ID_VALUE, P.NAME_PROVIDER NAME_VALUE from EPS_PROVIDER P
select NODE_VALUE ID_VALUE, NODE_NAME NAME_VALUE from RB_DIC_VALUE_LIST_RATE where ID_PARAM = 2 and ID_VALUE = 1
select ID_CURRENCY ID_VALUE, CURRENCY_COD NAME_VALUE from COM_CURRENCY where CURRENCY_CB <> ''
select -1 ID_VALUE, '_Не определена' NAME_VALUE union select ID_GROUP ID_VALUE, NAME_GROUP NAME_VALUE from RB_DOCUMENT_GROUP
select COLUMN_CONTENTS ID_VALUE,DECODE_CONTENTS NAME_VALUE from COM_COLUMN_DECODE where NAME_TABLE_COLUMN = 'RB_CONTRACT.TYPE_CONTRACT'
select ID_MODEL ID_VALUE, NAME_MODEL NAME_VALUE from RB_MODEL
select NODE_VALUE ID_VALUE, NODE_NAME NAME_VALUE from RB_DIC_VALUE_LIST_RATE where ID_PARAM = 6 and ID_VALUE = 1
select ID_PRODUCT ID_VALUE, NAME_PRODUCT NAME_VALUE from RB_PRODUCT
